aboutResume.resume: Full Stack Developer, Cloud Engineer and Technical Lead

badgesResume.title: Badges
badgesResume.cloudPractitioner: Provides a fundamental understanding of AWS Cloud concepts, services, and terminology. This is a good starting point for those in non-technical roles with no previous cloud or IT-related experience, or for those with on-premises IT experience looking to master the basics of the AWS Cloud.
badgesResume.solutionsArchitect: Exhibits knowledge and skills in AWS technology, across a wide range of AWS services. This certification focuses on designing cost- and performance-optimized solutions that demonstrate a strong understanding of the AWS Well-Architected Framework.
badgesResume.developerAssociate: Demonstrates knowledge and understanding of AWS core services, their uses, and basic AWS architecture best practices, as well as competencies in developing, deploying, and debugging cloud-based applications using AWS.
badgesResume.serverless: Earners of this badge have developed technical skills and knowledge of AWS serverless concepts and services with a focus on Lambda, API Gateway, SQS, SNS, Cognito, Kinesis and S3.
badgesResume.networkingCore: Earners of this badge have developed technical knowledge of AWS networking concepts and services with a focus on Amazon VPC, AWS Cloud WAN and Amazon Route 53.
badgesResume.eks: Earners of this badge have developed knowledge of running microservices and container workloads with Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS)

homePage.firstParagraphPart1: Leonardo Aranguren, a Software Developer, Cloud Engineer, and Technical Lead with a solid foundation in cloud technologies, especially AWS.
homePage.firstParagraphPart2: I hold multiple AWS certifications‚ÄîDeveloper Associate, Solutions Architect, Serverless‚Äîand advanced training in EKS, Networking Core, and Cloud Quest challenges.
homePage.secondParagraph: He designs, develops, and optimizes robust, scalable cloud solutions. With a strong technical focus, he leads by refining architectures and applying best practices to bring every project to its fullest potential. In every line of code, he seeks innovation, efficiency, and real impact.

cicd.title: Automation of CI/CD Pipelines
items: Designed and implemented CI/CD workflows using GitHub Actions and AWS CodePipeline, reducing deployment time by 60%.
Built reusable workflows for multi-environment deployments with rollback support.

serverless.title: Serverless Architecture
items: Developed scalable event-driven systems using AWS Lambda, Step Functions, and EventBridge.
Created robust observability tooling with custom CloudWatch dashboards and centralized log subscriptions.

resilient.title: Resilient and Secure Systems
items: Led the migration of legacy services to a serverless architecture, increasing uptime and reducing maintenance costs.
Enforced security best practices through IAM least privilege, API Gateway WAF, and VPC configurations.

fullstack.title: Full-Stack Development
items: Built responsive web applications using React, Next.js, and Material UI.
Developed backend services with Node.js, Python, and TypeScript.

intelligent.title: Intelligent Solutions
items: Integrated OpenAI and AWS Bedrock services to build internal AI copilots that boosted productivity in support and dev teams.
Led architecture decisions for cloud-native applications, focusing on scalability and cost optimization.

leadership.title: Team Leadership
items: Mentored junior developers and conducted technical interviews for new team members.
Facilitated knowledge sharing sessions and promoted best practices across development teams.
